languages.text: "Отыщите на Даргонусе проповедника, который ради меня мать родную убьет. Мне нужна абсолютная преданность, ясно?"
"I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"
languages.original_text: "Отыщите на Даргонусе проповедника, который ради меня мать родную убьет. Мне нужна абсолютная преданность, ясно?"

traits.locale_text: "I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"
"I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"

"I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"

languages.text: "Ich möchte, dass Ihr einen Prediger auf Dargonus findet, der seine eigene Mutter für mich töten würde. Ich werde nichts außer bedingungsloser Loyalität akzeptieren. Ist das klar?"
languages.original_text: "I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte, dass Ihr einen Prediger auf Dargonus findet, der seine eigene Mutter für mich töten würde. Ich werde nichts außer bedingungsloser Loyalität akzeptieren. Ist das klar?"

languages.text: « Je vous demande de trouver sur Dargonus un prêcheur qui tuerait sa mère pour moi. Je n'accepterai rien de moins qu'une loyauté absolue. C'est bien clair ? »
languages.original_text: "I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous demande de trouver sur Dargonus un prédicateur qui tuerait sa mère pour moi. Je n'accepterai rien de moins qu'une loyauté absolue. C'est bien clair ? »

languages.text: «Quiero que encuentre a un predicador en Dargonus que esté dispuesto a matar a su propia madre por mí. Exijo lealtad absoluta, ¿queda claro?».
languages.original_text: "I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: «Quiero que encuentre a un predicador en Dargonus que esté dispuesto a matar a su propia madre por mí. Exijo lealtad absoluta, ¿queda claro?».

languages.text: 「私のためなら母親でも殺すようなプリーチャーを、ダルゴナスで見つけてほしい。絶対的な忠誠心以外は認めない。わかったか？」
languages.original_text: "I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: 「私のためなら母親でも殺すようなプリーチャーを、ダルゴナスで見つけてほしい。絶対的な忠誠心以外は認めない。わかったか？」

languages.text: “我要你去达戈努斯，找个愿意为我付出一切，甚至愿意杀了自己亲妈的传教士。我只要绝对的忠诚，听懂了吗？”
languages.original_text: "I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"

traits.locale_text: “我要你去达戈努斯，找个愿意为我付出一切，甚至愿意杀了自己亲妈的传教士。我只要绝对的忠诚，听懂了吗？”

languages.text: "Dargonus'ta benim uğruma kendi annesini bile öldürebilecek bir vaiz bulmanı istiyorum. Kesin sadakat istiyorum ve daha azını kabul etmiyorum. Anlaşıldı mı?"
languages.original_text: "I want you to find a preacher on Dargonus who would kill their own mother for me. I will accept nothing less than absolute loyalty. Is that clear?"
